K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-007:127b-0: @127b bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-007:127b-1: na mo bha ga wa te ratna ke tu ra dz'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-007:127b-6: aom ratne ratne mah'a ratne ratna b'i dza ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-096-007:127b-7: 'di brjod cing bskor ba gcig byas pa'ang dpag tu med pa byas par 'gyur ro //
